markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Armor Potency](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2785)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 226 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Magic wards deflect attacks. Increase the armor's item bonus to AC by 1. The armor can be etched with one property rune.

 You can upgrade the _armor potency rune_ already etched on a suit of armor using the normal process for [upgrading items and runes](/Rules.aspx?ID=3157).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 5"
pfs="Standard"
>
Armor Potency (+1)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 226 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 581 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 160 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

**Craft Requirements** You're an expert in Crafting.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Armor Potency (+2)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 226 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 581 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 1,060 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Increase the armor's item bonus to AC by 2, and the armor can be etched with two property runes.

**Craft Requirements** You're a master in Crafting.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 18"
pfs="Standard"
>
Armor Potency (+3)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 226 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 581 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 20,560 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Increase the armor's item bonus to AC by 3, and the armor can be etched with three property runes.

**Craft Requirements** You're legendary in Crafting.
name: Armor Potency (+1)
